###1.激活码（永久激活）

![](https://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/6943526-e9db4788b3c2281f.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip%7CimageView2/2/w/1240)

![](https://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/6943526-eaf273cf38419100.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip%7CimageView2/2/w/1240)

>永久激活（亲测可用）
``EFM5ESULZQ---
``

>有效期至2021年10月（亲测可用）
`E70JHCOV2H---`

### 2.破解补丁（永久激活）

下载破解补丁文件，下载地址：[http://idea.lanyus.com/jar/JetbrainsCrack-3.1-release-enc.jar](http://idea.lanyus.com/jar/JetbrainsCrack-3.1-release-enc.jar)

下载完成后，将`JetbrainsCrack-3.1-release-enc.jar`文件复制到`phpstorm`的安装目录下

![](//upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/2627843-4fc322d4280b706d.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip|imageView2/2/w/915/format/webp)

进入`bin`目录，分别在`phpstorm.exe.vmoptions` ，`phpstorm64.exe.vmoptions`文件中的最后加上

![](//upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/2627843-d9ce2f583a33ca03.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip|imageView2/2/w/863/format/webp)

```
-javaagent:D:\PhpStorm 2018.2.2\JetbrainsCrack-3.1-release-enc.jar
```

打开`phpstorm`，在注册窗口的`Activation code`选项中加入

![](//upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/2627843-c43c2207ae020fd0.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip|imageView2/2/w/448/format/webp)

```
ThisCrackLicenseId-{
"licenseId":"ThisCrackLicenseId",
"licenseeName":"Admin",
"assigneeName":"",
"assigneeEmail":"you@gmail.com",
"licenseRestriction":"Admin",
"checkConcurrentUse":false,
"products":[
{"code":"II","paidUpTo":"2099-12-31"},
{"code":"DM","paidUpTo":"2099-12-31"},
{"code":"AC","paidUpTo":"2099-12-31"},
{"code":"RS0","paidUpTo":"2099-12-31"},
{"code":"WS","paidUpTo":"2099-12-31"},
{"code":"DPN","paidUpTo":"2099-12-31"},
{"code":"RC","paidUpTo":"2099-12-31"},
{"code":"PS","paidUpTo":"2099-12-31"},
{"code":"DC","paidUpTo":"2099-12-31"},
{"code":"RM","paidUpTo":"2099-12-31"},
{"code":"CL","paidUpTo":"2099-12-31"},
{"code":"PC","paidUpTo":"2099-12-31"}
],
"hash":"2911276/0",
"gracePeriodDays":7,
"autoProlongated":false}
```

重启`phpstorm`

![](//upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/2627843-e900eaaf289c1211.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip|imageView2/2/w/642/format/webp)

![](https://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/6943526-a8580e25f496ef5b.gif?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip)
